title: WebD Kviz App
desc: This quiz app is crafted utilizing the Open Trivia Database API, offering a dynamic range of questions to keep the experience engaging. Notably, user scores are persistently stored in local storage, providing a seamless and personalized journey for each quiz taker.

title: Notes App
desc: A simple notes app allowing users to create, delete, and search notes. All notes are stored securely in local storage for easy access.

title: Tasty Tips
desc: A basic blogging application that includes user account creation and allows users to post their views.

title: Stock Prediction
desc: A ToDo app made using MERN to keep track of your activities with a single click.

title: Portfolio
desc: A profile search engine and Chrome extension for accessing all social media profiles in one tap.

title: YT Transcript
desc: This repository contains the demo application of the package edualgo in Flutter and Dart.
